title: Dominating (111) Facets with ordered stacking in Perovskite Films
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01863J, Paper
Xiaotao Liu, Xiaoqing Jiang, Yanfeng Yin, Jiafeng Zhang, Hao Tian, Junxue Guo, Xin Guo, Can Li
While (100) facet-dominated FAPbI3 perovskite films have been readily obtained, another top-performing (111) facet-dominated ones with higher potential in preventing moisture-induced Î´-phase transition are hardly achieved. Particularly, growth kinetics of...
